Hello fellow poetry lover! Welcome to Memorize Your Classics, a distraction-free space for your favorite poems. Tap the red button to begin.

Quick guide:
- Next Screen (view collection):
 - Tap any poem to read
 - Tap + (icon bar at bottom) to add new poems
 - Swipe poem rectangle to the left to delete
 - Use import icon to import prepared texts
- Poem view:
 - Navigate with taps left and right half of screen

Everything is saved locally.

This app is for those moments when you\'re drowning in a sea of literary greatness, unable to decide which classic to commit to memory next. Whether you\'re facing the daunting task of memorizing Shakespeare\'s entire canon or simply can\'t choose between Dickinson and Whitman, this app is your literary lifeline. Just tap the big red "Poems" button and let serendipity be your guide.
